MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH26 postcode area of Penicuik. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to safely carry out repairs on our underground cable network we have had to remove further supplies. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:06pm on Wednesday 13 January 2021.
